## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)

## Testing
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Test coverage is 100%
- [ ] Tested manually

## Code Quality Checklist
- [ ] Code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] Self-review of code completed
- [ ] Code has proper type hints
- [ ] Google-style docstrings added for new functions/classes
- [ ] Backward compatibility maintained (if applicable)

## CI Checks (run locally)
- [ ] `poetry run ruff format` (code formatted)
- [ ] `poetry run ruff check src/ tests/` (linting passes)  
- [ ] `poetry run mypy src/ tests/` (type checking passes)
- [ ] `poetry run pytest --cov=src --cov-report=term-missing` (all tests pass with 100% coverage)
